price: 163. They are in varying grades with Allâh, and Allâh is All-Seer of what they do.
arabic: هُمۡ دَرَجَٰتٌ عِندَ ٱللَّهِۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرُۢ بِمَا يَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: hum darajātun ʿinda al-lahi wal-lahu baṣīrun bimā yaʿmalūna
